DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety tolerability multiple ascend fixed oral dos SRA-333 subject mild moderate Alzheimer 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating SRA-333 Mild Moderate Alzheimer 's Disease ( AD )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis probable AD accord NINCDSADRDA criterion . Men postmenopausal surgically sterile woman age 50 85 inclusive . Able give inform consent . Patient 's caregiver must consent participate study . Significant neurologic disease AD may affect cognition . Current clinically significant systemic illness likely deteriorate affect subject 's safety study . Other exclusion apply
